text: Adriana Sivieri (born 21 June 1918) is a retired Argentine-born Italian movie actress.Bertellini p.256 == Biography == She also worked in radio and as a voice actor, dubbing foreign movies for release in Italy. She was known for her roles in Vanity (1947), Bitter Rice (1949) and in At the Edge of the City (1953). Sivieri was born in Buenos Aires. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1918 births Category:Possibly living people Category:Argentine movie actors Category:Argentine television actors Category:Italian movie actors Category:Italian television actors Category:Italian voice actors Category:Radio actors Category:Actors from Buenos Aires
title: Adriana Sivieri
